es.dash_no_favorites: No favorites yet. Star pairs in the Trade tab to add them here.
es.defi_health_desc: Real-time verification of DeFi protocol connections
es.defi_connect_wallet: Connect your wallet for real investment
es.guide_trading_what_desc: Perpetual contracts allow you to speculate on crypto prices without an expiration date. You can use leverage up to 100x to amplify your gains (and losses).
es.guide_trading_step1: Deposit USDC via the Banking tab
es.guide_trading_step2: Select a pair (e.g., BTC-USD) on the chart
es.guide_trading_step4: Set your size, leverage, and Stop-Loss/Take-Profit orders
es.guide_trading_step5: Confirm the order and monitor your position
es.guide_trading_interface_chart: Chart: Analyze prices with candlesticks and technical indicators
es.guide_trading_interface_orderbook: Order Book: View supply and demand in real-time
es.guide_trading_interface_orderpanel: Order Panel: Place Market, Limit, or Stop orders
es.guide_trading_interface_positions: Positions: Manage your open positions and their P&L
es.guide_trading_warning: Leveraged trading carries high risks. You can lose more than your initial investment. Always use a Stop-Loss and never trade with money you cannot afford to lose.
es.guide_swap_what_desc: Swap allows you to instantly exchange one crypto for another. We aggregate the best prices from multiple DEXs to guarantee you the best rate, with no platform fees.
es.guide_swap_step1: Connect your wallet containing the tokens to swap
es.guide_swap_step2: Select the source token ("You pay") and target token ("You receive")
es.guide_swap_step3: Enter the amount - the conversion rate displays automatically
es.guide_swap_step4: Review the details (slippage, network fees) and confirm
es.guide_swap_minprice: Minimum Price: The swap fails if the price is less favorable
es.guide_swap_warning: Always verify the token address before swapping. Fraudulent tokens can have names similar to real tokens.
es.guide_banking_what_desc: The Banking module allows you to transfer funds between your wallet and Hyperliquid for trading. Your funds remain under your full control (self-custody).
es.guide_banking_deposit_step2: Select the source network (Arbitrum recommended for lowest fees)
es.guide_banking_deposit_step3: Enter the USDC amount to deposit (minimum 10 USDC)
es.guide_banking_deposit_step4: Confirm the transaction in your wallet
es.guide_banking_withdraw_step1: Check your available balance on Hyperliquid
es.guide_banking_withdraw_step2: Choose the destination network to receive your funds
es.guide_banking_withdraw_step3: Enter the amount to withdraw and confirm
es.guide_banking_warning: Always verify the selected network before depositing. Sending funds to the wrong network can result in permanent loss.
es.guide_bonds_what_desc: Tokenized bonds are traditional bonds converted into tokens on the blockchain. You invest in USDC and receive fixed interest until maturity.
es.guide_bonds_step1: Choose a product based on yield (APY), duration, and risk level
es.guide_bonds_step2: Invest an amount in USDC (minimum shown on each product)
es.guide_bonds_step3: Interest accrues daily and is visible in "Accrued Yield"
es.guide_bonds_step4: At maturity, retrieve your capital + interest
es.guide_bonds_type_treasury: US Treasury: US Treasury Bills - Very low risk, stable yield (~5%)
es.guide_bonds_type_corporate: Corporate: Corporate Bonds - Higher yield, moderate risk
es.guide_bonds_type_defi: DeFi Yield: Automated DeFi strategies - Variable yield, higher risk
es.guide_bonds_type_credit: Credit: Tokenized private credits - High yield, limited liquidity
es.guide_bonds_warning: Investments carry risks. Past returns do not guarantee future returns. Only invest what you can afford to lose.
es.guide_tools_what_desc: A suite of advanced tools to optimize your trading: arbitrage opportunity detection, AI advisor, whale tracking, and market analysis.
es.guide_tools_arbitrage: Arbitrage Scanner: Detects price differences between exchanges
es.guide_tools_ai: AI Advisor: AI analysis that suggests strategies based on market conditions
es.guide_tools_whale: Whale Tracker: Track large portfolio movements in real-time
es.guide_tools_market: Market Analysis: Technical indicators, market sentiment, and on-chain data
es.guide_tools_risk: Risk Calculator: Calculate your optimal position size based on your risk
es.guide_tools_scanner_title: How to Use the Arbitrage Scanner?
es.guide_tools_scanner_step1: Activate the scanner to monitor opportunities in real-time
es.guide_tools_scanner_step2: Filter by token, exchange, or minimum spread
es.guide_tools_scanner_step3: When an opportunity appears, check fees and liquidity
es.guide_tools_warning: Tools provide information and suggestions, not financial advice. Always do your own research.
es.institutional_access_desc: Access exclusive bond products with higher yields and larger allocations.
es.guide_wallet_what_desc: Your secure post-quantum wallet. Manage your private keys, send and receive crypto, and protect your assets with quantum-resistant cryptography.
es.guide_wallet_kyber: CRYSTALS-Kyber: Encryption algorithm resistant to quantum attacks
es.guide_wallet_selfcustody: Self-Custody: Your keys stay on your device, never on our servers
es.guide_wallet_recovery: Social Recovery: Recover your wallet via trusted contacts
es.guide_wallet_send_step1: Click "Send" and select the token to send
es.guide_wallet_send_step2: Enter the recipient\'s address (verify it twice!)
es.guide_wallet_send_step3: Set the amount and verify network fees
es.guide_wallet_send_step4: Confirm the transaction with your security method
es.guide_wallet_warning: NEVER share your seed phrase or private key. Obelisk will never ask for this information. Blockchain transactions are irreversible.
es.post_quantum_signatures_desc: All transactions signed with quantum-resistant algorithms.
es.start_hero_subtitle: No expertise needed. We guide you step by step, your funds are protected.
es.start_step1_desc: Use MetaMask or any compatible wallet. Your keys stay with you, we can never access them.
es.start_step2_desc: From the safest (4% APY, 100% protected capital) to the most dynamic (20% APY). Each product clearly explains the risks.
es.start_step3_desc: Deposit your USDC/ETH. Gains accumulate automatically. Withdraw whenever you want, no hidden fees.
es.start_security_subtitle: Here\'s how we protect your money and data
es.start_sec_noncustodial_desc: Your funds stay in YOUR wallet. We never hold your cryptos. Even if we get hacked, your funds are safe.
es.start_sec_audited_desc: All code is open-source and verified by security experts. No backdoors, no surprises.
es.start_sec_encryption_desc: All communications are encrypted. Your personal data is protected by military-grade cryptography.
es.start_sec_antihack_desc: Real-time detection system for intrusion attempts. Automatic alerts and immediate blocking.
es.start_sec_ratelimit_desc: Protection against DDoS and bruteforce attacks. Impossible to spam or overload the system.
es.start_sec_audittrail_desc: Every action is recorded. In case of issues, we can trace exactly what happened.
es.start_prot_keys_desc: Unlike centralized exchanges (Binance, Coinbase), we NEVER have access to your keys. Your cryptos remain under your total control.
es.start_prot_capital_desc: Our "Protected Vaults" products guarantee your initial capital. Even if the market drops, you get back at least what you deposited.
es.start_prot_insurance_desc: Part of the funds feed an insurance pool. In case of technical issues or hacks, users are compensated.
es.start_prot_instant_desc: No lock-up period. Withdraw your funds at any time, in seconds. No need to wait or request authorization.
es.start_prot_fees_desc: All fees are clearly displayed BEFORE you confirm. No bad surprises on your statement.
es.start_faq1_q: What is a wallet and why do I need one?
es.start_faq1_a: A wallet is like a digital safe for your cryptos. MetaMask is the most popular - it\'s a free browser extension. You create a password and a 12-word "secret phrase". KEEP THIS PHRASE SECURE - it\'s the only way to recover your funds if you lose access.
es.start_faq2_a: With our "100% protected" products, you get back at least your initial capital. For riskier products (8-20% APY), part of the capital may be exposed to market fluctuations, but it\'s always clearly indicated before investment.
es.start_faq3_a: We take a small commission (0.1-0.5%) on generated gains, not on your capital. If you don\'t earn anything, we don\'t earn anything. Our interests are aligned with yours.
es.start_faq4_a: Your funds are in YOUR wallet, not with us. Even if our site is compromised, a hacker cannot access your cryptos. That\'s the advantage of being "non-custodial". Additionally, we have an insurance pool to cover losses in case of technical bugs.
es.start_faq5_q: How long to withdraw my funds?
es.start_faq5_a: Instant. Click "Withdraw", confirm in your wallet, and your funds are available in seconds. No waiting period, no approval required.
es.start_cta_subtitle: Join thousands of investors growing their capital safely.
es.combos_hero_desc: Combined investment strategies - Automatic multi-product diversification with capital protection. Invest in one click in portfolios optimized by experts.
es.combos_disclaimer: Past returns do not guarantee future returns. Invest responsibly.
es.combos_load_error: Loading error. Check that the server is running.
es.wallet_password_min_8: Password must be at least 8 characters
es.wallet_seed_important: IMPORTANT: Write down these words and keep them safe!
es.wallet_seed_only_way: This recovery phrase is the ONLY way to restore your wallet.
es.wallet_confirm_backup: I have saved my recovery phrase securely
es.wallet_please_confirm_backup: Please confirm that you have saved your phrase
es.wallet_verify_seed_instruction: Verify your recovery phrase by entering the requested words:
es.wallet_words_incorrect: One or more words are incorrect
es.course_defi_strategies_desc: Master yield farming, liquidity pools, and DeFi protocols
es.course_getting_started_desc: Your first steps into crypto trading
es.course_leverage_desc: Learn to use leverage safely and effectively
es.course_risk_management_desc: Protect your capital with proven strategies
es.course_trading_fundamentals_desc: Master the basics of technical analysis
es.footer_security_notice: Your funds are protected by post-quantum cryptography
es.glossary_apy_desc: Annual Percentage Yield - your yearly return rate
es.glossary_leverage_desc: Multiply your trading power with borrowed funds
es.glossary_liquidation_desc: Forced position closure when margin is insufficient
es.glossary_margin_desc: Collateral required to open leveraged positions
es.glossary_noncustodial_desc: You control your keys - we never hold your funds
es.glossary_postquantum_desc: Security resistant to quantum computer attacks
es.glossary_slippage_desc: Difference between expected and executed price
es.guardian_help: Enter Ethereum addresses of trusted contacts
es.guide_portfolio_tip: Pro tip: Check your portfolio daily to track performance
es.guide_portfolio_what_desc: Track all your investments, positions, and performance in one place
es.learn_subtitle: Master crypto trading from basics to advanced
es.modal_create_wallet_desc: Create a new post-quantum secure wallet
es.risk_very_low_desc: Capital preservation focus. Minimal volatility, suitable for conservative investors.
es.risk_low_desc: Stable returns with limited downside. Suitable for risk-averse investors.
es.risk_low_medium_desc: Slightly more risk than low, still relatively stable. Good balance for cautious investors.
es.risk_medium_desc: Balanced risk/reward. May experience moderate volatility. Suitable for most investors.
es.risk_medium_high_desc: Above average risk with potential for higher returns. Requires some experience.
es.risk_high_desc: Significant volatility expected. Potential for substantial gains or losses. For experienced investors only.
es.risk_very_high_desc: Extreme volatility. High probability of significant losses. Only invest what you can afford to lose entirely.
es.risk_warning_text: Past performance does not guarantee future results. Cryptocurrency investments are highly volatile and may result in total loss of capital.
es.threshold_help: Number of guardians needed to recover
es.tip_invest_desc: Start with small amounts to learn
es.wallet_hero_subtitle: Secure your crypto with post-quantum protection
es.combo_blue_chip_desc: Focus on BTC & ETH with yield optimization
es.combo_passive_income_desc: Steady yield from staking and lending
es.combo_micro_starter_desc: Perfect for testing with minimal capital
es.about_subtitle: The power of institutional finance, accessible to everyone
es.about_hero_desc: Obelisk DEX is not just an exchange. It\'s your personal private investment bank - offering the same sophisticated tools and products that were once reserved for the ultra-wealthy.
es.about_feature_1_desc: You are your own bank. Keep full control of your assets with post-quantum secured wallets. No intermediaries, no frozen accounts, no withdrawal limits.
es.about_feature_2_desc: Access DeFi yields, structured products, tokenized bonds, and investment combos previously available only to hedge funds and institutions.
es.about_feature_3_desc: Grow your capital with staking (4-25% APY), liquidity pools, yield vaults, and smart investment strategies.
es.about_feature_4_desc: Your financial data stays yours. Zero server storage, local encryption, and optional stealth transactions.
es.about_why_1: Traditional banks offer 0.5% savings rates. We offer 4-25% APY.
es.about_why_2: Banks charge fees. We generate yield.
es.about_why_3: Banks can freeze your money. We can\'t - you hold the keys.
es.about_why_4: Banks close on weekends. We\'re live 24/7/365.
es.about_cta_desc: Join thousands of users who have discovered a better way to bank.

zh.guide_swap_warning: Always verify the token address before swapping. Fraudulent tokens can have names similar to real tokens.
zh.guide_banking_what_desc: The Banking module allows you to transfer funds between your wallet and Hyperliquid for trading. Your funds remain under your full control (self-custody).
zh.guide_banking_deposit_step2: Select the source network (Arbitrum recommended for lowest fees)
zh.guide_banking_deposit_step3: Enter the USDC amount to deposit (minimum 10 USDC)
zh.guide_banking_deposit_step4: Confirm the transaction in your wallet
zh.guide_banking_withdraw_step1: Check your available balance on Hyperliquid
zh.guide_banking_withdraw_step2: Choose the destination network to receive your funds
zh.guide_banking_withdraw_step3: Enter the amount to withdraw and confirm
zh.guide_banking_warning: Always verify the selected network before depositing. Sending funds to the wrong network can result in permanent loss.
zh.guide_bonds_what_desc: Tokenized bonds are traditional bonds converted into tokens on the blockchain. You invest in USDC and receive fixed interest until maturity.
zh.guide_bonds_step1: Choose a product based on yield (APY), duration, and risk level
zh.guide_bonds_step2: Invest an amount in USDC (minimum shown on each product)
zh.guide_bonds_step3: Interest accrues daily and is visible in "Accrued Yield"
zh.guide_bonds_step4: At maturity, retrieve your capital + interest
zh.guide_bonds_type_treasury: US Treasury: US Treasury Bills - Very low risk, stable yield (~5%)
zh.guide_bonds_type_corporate: Corporate: Corporate Bonds - Higher yield, moderate risk
zh.guide_bonds_type_defi: DeFi Yield: Automated DeFi strategies - Variable yield, higher risk
zh.guide_bonds_type_credit: Credit: Tokenized private credits - High yield, limited liquidity
zh.guide_bonds_warning: Investments carry risks. Past returns do not guarantee future returns. Only invest what you can afford to lose.
zh.guide_tools_what_desc: A suite of advanced tools to optimize your trading: arbitrage opportunity detection, AI advisor, whale tracking, and market analysis.
zh.guide_tools_arbitrage: Arbitrage Scanner: Detects price differences between exchanges
zh.guide_tools_ai: AI Advisor: AI analysis that suggests strategies based on market conditions
zh.guide_tools_whale: Whale Tracker: Track large portfolio movements in real-time
zh.guide_tools_market: Market Analysis: Technical indicators, market sentiment, and on-chain data
zh.guide_tools_risk: Risk Calculator: Calculate your optimal position size based on your risk
zh.guide_tools_scanner_title: How to Use the Arbitrage Scanner?
zh.guide_tools_scanner_step1: Activate the scanner to monitor opportunities in real-time
zh.guide_tools_scanner_step2: Filter by token, exchange, or minimum spread
zh.guide_tools_scanner_step3: When an opportunity appears, check fees and liquidity
zh.guide_tools_warning: Tools provide information and suggestions, not financial advice. Always do your own research.
zh.institutional_access_desc: Access exclusive bond products with higher yields and larger allocations.
zh.guide_wallet_what_desc: Your secure post-quantum wallet. Manage your private keys, send and receive crypto, and protect your assets with quantum-resistant cryptography.
zh.guide_wallet_kyber: CRYSTALS-Kyber: Encryption algorithm resistant to quantum attacks
zh.guide_wallet_selfcustody: Self-Custody: Your keys stay on your device, never on our servers
zh.guide_wallet_recovery: Social Recovery: Recover your wallet via trusted contacts
zh.guide_wallet_send_step1: Click "Send" and select the token to send
zh.guide_wallet_send_step2: Enter the recipient\'s address (verify it twice!)
zh.guide_wallet_send_step3: Set the amount and verify network fees
zh.guide_wallet_send_step4: Confirm the transaction with your security method
zh.guide_wallet_warning: NEVER share your seed phrase or private key. Obelisk will never ask for this information. Blockchain transactions are irreversible.
zh.post_quantum_signatures_desc: All transactions signed with quantum-resistant algorithms.
zh.start_hero_subtitle: No expertise needed. We guide you step by step, your funds are protected.
zh.start_step1_desc: Use MetaMask or any compatible wallet. Your keys stay with you, we can never access them.
zh.start_step2_desc: From the safest (4% APY, 100% protected capital) to the most dynamic (20% APY). Each product clearly explains the risks.
zh.start_step3_desc: Deposit your USDC/ETH. Gains accumulate automatically. Withdraw whenever you want, no hidden fees.
zh.start_security_subtitle: Here\'s how we protect your money and data
zh.start_sec_noncustodial_desc: Your funds stay in YOUR wallet. We never hold your cryptos. Even if we get hacked, your funds are safe.
zh.start_sec_audited_desc: All code is open-source and verified by security experts. No backdoors, no surprises.
zh.start_sec_encryption_desc: All communications are encrypted. Your personal data is protected by military-grade cryptography.
zh.start_sec_antihack_desc: Real-time detection system for intrusion attempts. Automatic alerts and immediate blocking.
zh.start_sec_ratelimit_desc: Protection against DDoS and bruteforce attacks. Impossible to spam or overload the system.
zh.start_sec_audittrail_desc: Every action is recorded. In case of issues, we can trace exactly what happened.
zh.start_prot_keys_desc: Unlike centralized exchanges (Binance, Coinbase), we NEVER have access to your keys. Your cryptos remain under your total control.
zh.start_prot_capital_desc: Our "Protected Vaults" products guarantee your initial capital. Even if the market drops, you get back at least what you deposited.
zh.start_prot_insurance_desc: Part of the funds feed an insurance pool. In case of technical issues or hacks, users are compensated.
zh.start_prot_instant_desc: No lock-up period. Withdraw your funds at any time, in seconds. No need to wait or request authorization.
zh.start_prot_fees_desc: All fees are clearly displayed BEFORE you confirm. No bad surprises on your statement.
zh.start_faq1_q: What is a wallet and why do I need one?
zh.start_faq1_a: A wallet is like a digital safe for your cryptos. MetaMask is the most popular - it\'s a free browser extension. You create a password and a 12-word "secret phrase". KEEP THIS PHRASE SECURE - it\'s the only way to recover your funds if you lose access.
zh.start_faq2_a: With our "100% protected" products, you get back at least your initial capital. For riskier products (8-20% APY), part of the capital may be exposed to market fluctuations, but it\'s always clearly indicated before investment.
zh.start_faq3_a: We take a small commission (0.1-0.5%) on generated gains, not on your capital. If you don\'t earn anything, we don\'t earn anything. Our interests are aligned with yours.
zh.start_faq4_a: Your funds are in YOUR wallet, not with us. Even if our site is compromised, a hacker cannot access your cryptos. That\'s the advantage of being "non-custodial". Additionally, we have an insurance pool to cover losses in case of technical bugs.
zh.start_faq5_q: How long to withdraw my funds?
zh.start_faq5_a: Instant. Click "Withdraw", confirm in your wallet, and your funds are available in seconds. No waiting period, no approval required.
zh.start_cta_subtitle: Join thousands of investors growing their capital safely.
zh.combos_hero_desc: Combined investment strategies - Automatic multi-product diversification with capital protection. Invest in one click in portfolios optimized by experts.
zh.combos_disclaimer: Past returns do not guarantee future returns. Invest responsibly.
zh.combos_load_error: Loading error. Check that the server is running.
zh.wallet_password_min_8: Password must be at least 8 characters
zh.wallet_seed_important: IMPORTANT: Write down these words and keep them safe!
zh.wallet_seed_only_way: This recovery phrase is the ONLY way to restore your wallet.
zh.wallet_confirm_backup: I have saved my recovery phrase securely
zh.wallet_please_confirm_backup: Please confirm that you have saved your phrase
zh.wallet_verify_seed_instruction: Verify your recovery phrase by entering the requested words:
zh.wallet_words_incorrect: One or more words are incorrect

zh.glossary_apy_desc: Annual Percentage Yield - your yearly return rate
zh.glossary_leverage_desc: Multiply your trading power with borrowed funds
zh.glossary_liquidation_desc: Forced position closure when margin is insufficient
zh.glossary_margin_desc: Collateral required to open leveraged positions
zh.glossary_noncustodial_desc: You control your keys - we never hold your funds
zh.glossary_postquantum_desc: Security resistant to quantum computer attacks
zh.glossary_slippage_desc: Difference between expected and executed price
zh.guardian_help: Enter Ethereum addresses of trusted contacts
zh.guide_portfolio_tip: Pro tip: Check your portfolio daily to track performance
zh.guide_portfolio_what_desc: Track all your investments, positions, and performance in one place
zh.learn_subtitle: Master crypto trading from basics to advanced
zh.modal_create_wallet_desc: Create a new post-quantum secure wallet
zh.risk_very_low_desc: Capital preservation focus. Minimal volatility, suitable for conservative investors.
zh.risk_low_desc: Stable returns with limited downside. Suitable for risk-averse investors.
zh.risk_low_medium_desc: Slightly more risk than low, still relatively stable. Good balance for cautious investors.
zh.risk_medium_desc: Balanced risk/reward. May experience moderate volatility. Suitable for most investors.
zh.risk_medium_high_desc: Above average risk with potential for higher returns. Requires some experience.
zh.risk_high_desc: Significant volatility expected. Potential for substantial gains or losses. For experienced investors only.
zh.risk_very_high_desc: Extreme volatility. High probability of significant losses. Only invest what you can afford to lose entirely.
zh.risk_warning_text: Past performance does not guarantee future results. Cryptocurrency investments are highly volatile and may result in total loss of capital.
zh.threshold_help: Number of guardians needed to recover
zh.tip_invest_desc: Start with small amounts to learn
zh.wallet_hero_subtitle: Secure your crypto with post-quantum protection
zh.combo_blue_chip_desc: Focus on BTC & ETH with yield optimization
zh.combo_passive_income_desc: Steady yield from staking and lending
zh.combo_micro_starter_desc: Perfect for testing with minimal capital
zh.about_subtitle: The power of institutional finance, accessible to everyone
zh.about_hero_desc: Obelisk DEX is not just an exchange. It\'s your personal private investment bank - offering the same sophisticated tools and products that were once reserved for the ultra-wealthy.
zh.about_feature_1_desc: You are your own bank. Keep full control of your assets with post-quantum secured wallets. No intermediaries, no frozen accounts, no withdrawal limits.
zh.about_feature_2_desc: Access DeFi yields, structured products, tokenized bonds, and investment combos previously available only to hedge funds and institutions.
zh.about_feature_3_desc: Grow your capital with staking (4-25% APY), liquidity pools, yield vaults, and smart investment strategies.
zh.about_feature_4_desc: Your financial data stays yours. Zero server storage, local encryption, and optional stealth transactions.
zh.about_why_1: Traditional banks offer 0.5% savings rates. We offer 4-25% APY.
zh.about_why_2: Banks charge fees. We generate yield.
zh.about_why_3: Banks can freeze your money. We can\'t - you hold the keys.
zh.about_why_4: Banks close on weekends. We\'re live 24/7/365.
zh.about_cta_desc: Join thousands of users who have discovered a better way to bank.

ko.guide_bonds_type_treasury: US Treasury: US Treasury Bills - Very low risk, stable yield (~5%)
ko.guide_bonds_type_corporate: Corporate: Corporate Bonds - Higher yield, moderate risk
ko.guide_bonds_type_defi: DeFi Yield: Automated DeFi strategies - Variable yield, higher risk
ko.guide_bonds_type_credit: Credit: Tokenized private credits - High yield, limited liquidity
ko.guide_bonds_warning: Investments carry risks. Past returns do not guarantee future returns. Only invest what you can afford to lose.
ko.guide_tools_what_desc: A suite of advanced tools to optimize your trading: arbitrage opportunity detection, AI advisor, whale tracking, and market analysis.
ko.guide_tools_arbitrage: Arbitrage Scanner: Detects price differences between exchanges
ko.guide_tools_ai: AI Advisor: AI analysis that suggests strategies based on market conditions
ko.guide_tools_whale: Whale Tracker: Track large portfolio movements in real-time
ko.guide_tools_market: Market Analysis: Technical indicators, market sentiment, and on-chain data
ko.guide_tools_risk: Risk Calculator: Calculate your optimal position size based on your risk
ko.guide_tools_scanner_title: How to Use the Arbitrage Scanner?
ko.guide_tools_scanner_step1: Activate the scanner to monitor opportunities in real-time
ko.guide_tools_scanner_step2: Filter by token, exchange, or minimum spread
ko.guide_tools_scanner_step3: When an opportunity appears, check fees and liquidity
ko.guide_tools_warning: Tools provide information and suggestions, not financial advice. Always do your own research.
ko.institutional_access_desc: Access exclusive bond products with higher yields and larger allocations.
ko.guide_wallet_what_desc: Your secure post-quantum wallet. Manage your private keys, send and receive crypto, and protect your assets with quantum-resistant cryptography.
ko.guide_wallet_kyber: CRYSTALS-Kyber: Encryption algorithm resistant to quantum attacks
ko.guide_wallet_selfcustody: Self-Custody: Your keys stay on your device, never on our servers
ko.guide_wallet_recovery: Social Recovery: Recover your wallet via trusted contacts
ko.guide_wallet_send_step1: Click "Send" and select the token to send
ko.guide_wallet_send_step2: Enter the recipient\'s address (verify it twice!)
ko.guide_wallet_send_step3: Set the amount and verify network fees
ko.guide_wallet_send_step4: Confirm the transaction with your security method
ko.guide_wallet_warning: NEVER share your seed phrase or private key. Obelisk will never ask for this information. Blockchain transactions are irreversible.
ko.post_quantum_signatures_desc: All transactions signed with quantum-resistant algorithms.
ko.start_hero_subtitle: No expertise needed. We guide you step by step, your funds are protected.
ko.start_step1_desc: Use MetaMask or any compatible wallet. Your keys stay with you, we can never access them.
ko.start_step2_desc: From the safest (4% APY, 100% protected capital) to the most dynamic (20% APY). Each product clearly explains the risks.
ko.start_step3_desc: Deposit your USDC/ETH. Gains accumulate automatically. Withdraw whenever you want, no hidden fees.
ko.start_security_subtitle: Here\'s how we protect your money and data
ko.start_sec_noncustodial_desc: Your funds stay in YOUR wallet. We never hold your cryptos. Even if we get hacked, your funds are safe.
ko.start_sec_audited_desc: All code is open-source and verified by security experts. No backdoors, no surprises.
ko.start_sec_encryption_desc: All communications are encrypted. Your personal data is protected by military-grade cryptography.
ko.start_sec_antihack_desc: Real-time detection system for intrusion attempts. Automatic alerts and immediate blocking.
ko.start_sec_ratelimit_desc: Protection against DDoS and bruteforce attacks. Impossible to spam or overload the system.
ko.start_sec_audittrail_desc: Every action is recorded. In case of issues, we can trace exactly what happened.
ko.start_prot_keys_desc: Unlike centralized exchanges (Binance, Coinbase), we NEVER have access to your keys. Your cryptos remain under your total control.
ko.start_prot_capital_desc: Our "Protected Vaults" products guarantee your initial capital. Even if the market drops, you get back at least what you deposited.
ko.start_prot_insurance_desc: Part of the funds feed an insurance pool. In case of technical issues or hacks, users are compensated.
ko.start_prot_instant_desc: No lock-up period. Withdraw your funds at any time, in seconds. No need to wait or request authorization.
ko.start_prot_fees_desc: All fees are clearly displayed BEFORE you confirm. No bad surprises on your statement.
ko.start_faq1_q: What is a wallet and why do I need one?
ko.start_faq1_a: A wallet is like a digital safe for your cryptos. MetaMask is the most popular - it\'s a free browser extension. You create a password and a 12-word "secret phrase". KEEP THIS PHRASE SECURE - it\'s the only way to recover your funds if you lose access.
ko.start_faq2_a: With our "100% protected" products, you get back at least your initial capital. For riskier products (8-20% APY), part of the capital may be exposed to market fluctuations, but it\'s always clearly indicated before investment.
ko.start_faq3_a: We take a small commission (0.1-0.5%) on generated gains, not on your capital. If you don\'t earn anything, we don\'t earn anything. Our interests are aligned with yours.
ko.start_faq4_a: Your funds are in YOUR wallet, not with us. Even if our site is compromised, a hacker cannot access your cryptos. That\'s the advantage of being "non-custodial". Additionally, we have an insurance pool to cover losses in case of technical bugs.
ko.start_faq5_q: How long to withdraw my funds?
ko.start_faq5_a: Instant. Click "Withdraw", confirm in your wallet, and your funds are available in seconds. No waiting period, no approval required.
ko.start_cta_subtitle: Join thousands of investors growing their capital safely.
ko.combos_hero_desc: Combined investment strategies - Automatic multi-product diversification with capital protection. Invest in one click in portfolios optimized by experts.
ko.combos_disclaimer: Past returns do not guarantee future returns. Invest responsibly.
ko.combos_load_error: Loading error. Check that the server is running.

ko.wallet_seed_important: IMPORTANT: Write down these words and keep them safe!
ko.wallet_seed_only_way: This recovery phrase is the ONLY way to restore your wallet.
ko.wallet_confirm_backup: I have saved my recovery phrase securely
ko.wallet_please_confirm_backup: Please confirm that you have saved your phrase

ko.glossary_apy_desc: Annual Percentage Yield - your yearly return rate
ko.glossary_leverage_desc: Multiply your trading power with borrowed funds
ko.glossary_liquidation_desc: Forced position closure when margin is insufficient
ko.glossary_margin_desc: Collateral required to open leveraged positions
ko.glossary_noncustodial_desc: You control your keys - we never hold your funds
ko.glossary_postquantum_desc: Security resistant to quantum computer attacks
ko.glossary_slippage_desc: Difference between expected and executed price
ko.guardian_help: Enter Ethereum addresses of trusted contacts
ko.guide_portfolio_tip: Pro tip: Check your portfolio daily to track performance
ko.guide_portfolio_what_desc: Track all your investments, positions, and performance in one place
ko.learn_subtitle: Master crypto trading from basics to advanced
ko.modal_create_wallet_desc: Create a new post-quantum secure wallet
ko.risk_very_low_desc: Capital preservation focus. Minimal volatility, suitable for conservative investors.
ko.risk_low_desc: Stable returns with limited downside. Suitable for risk-averse investors.
ko.risk_low_medium_desc: Slightly more risk than low, still relatively stable. Good balance for cautious investors.
ko.risk_medium_desc: Balanced risk/reward. May experience moderate volatility. Suitable for most investors.
ko.risk_medium_high_desc: Above average risk with potential for higher returns. Requires some experience.
ko.risk_high_desc: Significant volatility expected. Potential for substantial gains or losses. For experienced investors only.
ko.risk_very_high_desc: Extreme volatility. High probability of significant losses. Only invest what you can afford to lose entirely.
ko.risk_warning_text: Past performance does not guarantee future results. Cryptocurrency investments are highly volatile and may result in total loss of capital.
ko.threshold_help: Number of guardians needed to recover
ko.tip_invest_desc: Start with small amounts to learn
ko.wallet_hero_subtitle: Secure your crypto with post-quantum protection
ko.combo_blue_chip_desc: Focus on BTC & ETH with yield optimization
ko.combo_passive_income_desc: Steady yield from staking and lending
ko.combo_micro_starter_desc: Perfect for testing with minimal capital
ko.about_subtitle: The power of institutional finance, accessible to everyone
ko.about_hero_desc: Obelisk DEX is not just an exchange. It\'s your personal private investment bank - offering the same sophisticated tools and products that were once reserved for the ultra-wealthy.
ko.about_feature_1_desc: You are your own bank. Keep full control of your assets with post-quantum secured wallets. No intermediaries, no frozen accounts, no withdrawal limits.
ko.about_feature_2_desc: Access DeFi yields, structured products, tokenized bonds, and investment combos previously available only to hedge funds and institutions.
ko.about_feature_3_desc: Grow your capital with staking (4-25% APY), liquidity pools, yield vaults, and smart investment strategies.
ko.about_feature_4_desc: Your financial data stays yours. Zero server storage, local encryption, and optional stealth transactions.
ko.about_why_1: Traditional banks offer 0.5% savings rates. We offer 4-25% APY.
ko.about_why_2: Banks charge fees. We generate yield.
ko.about_why_3: Banks can freeze your money. We can\'t - you hold the keys.
ko.about_why_4: Banks close on weekends. We\'re live 24/7/365.
ko.about_cta_desc: Join thousands of users who have discovered a better way to bank.
